net.sourceforge.waters.model.marshaller

Interface CopyingProxyUnmarshaller<D extends DocumentProxy>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProxyUnmarshaller<D>

    public interface CopyingProxyUnmarshaller<D extends DocumentProxy>
extends ProxyUnmarshaller<D>

    An unmarshalling interface to support importing of multiple documents from a single external source.

    A copying unmarshaller reads a document, typically from an external file format, and while doing so, it may create several documents that are written to a specified output directory.

    Author:
    Robi Malik

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sourceforge.waters.model.marshaller.ProxyUnmarshaller

        getDefaultExtension, getDocumentClass, getDocumentManager, getSupportedExtensions, getSupportedFileFilters, setDocumentManager, unmarshal

    • Method Detail

      • getOutputDirectory

        File getOutputDirectory()
        Gets the output directory of this copying unmarshaller.

      • setOutputDirectory

        void setOutputDirectory(File outputdir)
        Sets the output directory for this copying unmarshaller. The output directory is the location where all files created while unmarshalling are saved.

      • unmarshalCopying

        D unmarshalCopying(URI uri)
            throws IOException,
                   WatersMarshalException,
                   WatersUnmarshalException
        Loads a document from a file.
        Parameters:
        uri - A URI specifying the location of the document to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The loaded document.
        Throws:
        WatersUnmarshalException - to indicate that parsing the input file has failed for some reason.
        WatersMarshalException - to indicate that some output file could not be written.
        IOException - to indicate that the input file could not be opened or read or written.
